title: Is solipsism or realism more likely to be true? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm going with realism. While we may not know the external world as it truly is, there is no reason to think we know our own minds any better. The brain in a vat argument is cool. It does seem to be a strain to think we can know little or nothing about reality and yet have solipsism generate so much persuasive force.
